alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana, northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and south central Amite Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Darlington, or near Greensburg, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite City, Roseland, Darlington, Easleyville and Tangipahoa. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 50 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
